registration.epon:
conf t
interface epon-olt_1/{{onu.interface.slot}}/{{onu.interface.port}}
onu {{params.reg_number}} type 1GE_EPON mac  {{onu.mac}}
!
pon-onu-mng epon-onu_1/1/1:9
vlan port eth_0/1 mode tag vlan 4078 priority 0
interface-loopdetect eth_0/1 activate
!
interface epon-onu_1/{{onu.interface.slot}}/{{onu.interface.port}}:{{params.reg_number}}
  property description {{params.description}}
  sla-profile 100MB vport 1
  service-port 1 vport 1 user-vlan {{device.params.user_vlan_id}} vlan {{device.params.user_vlan_id}}
  ip dhcp snooping enable vport 1
  ip access-group 300 in vport 1
!
end
wr
